H1.text: who is eli whitney and what did he invent. Spinning Jenny

H3.text: who is eli whitney and what did he invent. Cotton gin

A4.text: Eli Whitney invented the cotton gin in 1793, which revolutionized cotton harvesting in the South.

A5.text: Whitney's advocacy of interchangeable parts revolutionized the manufacturing industry in the North.

A6.text: Letter from Eli Whitney to his Father regarding his invention of the cotton gin, September 11, 1793
